data.title: Vision, Mission, Purpose — The differences and relationships
data.meta_description: Are you confused about the differences in Purpose, vision, mission, goals, strategies, objectives and key Results (OKR)? You are not alone. We often describe those words as what can move our…
data.text:
Are you confused about the differences in Purpose, vision, mission, goals, strategies, objectives and key Results (OKR)? You are not alone.

We often describe those words as what can move our organization and teams to success. As a product manager, it became my responsibility to define them for my team — and I was confused!

It was obvious to me what Purpose is because I co-run a non-profit organization, Project One00, that help people discover their bigger Purposes. But all the other terms? They were just a big blur to me. So I went on a mission to figure out their differences and relationship so they could be meaningful for my team and not just fluff. As I began to dive deeper, I quickly realized that most of these terms were up for interpretation. It depends on which book you read and which influencer you follow; you may end up with a different definition for each.

With that, I consolidated my knowledge, research and interpretation and turned the definitions into an infographic. This graph brought me a lot of clarity and made those words much more meaningful for me. I hope it will do the same for you as well.

The Core — Purpose and Values

Everything starts with the WHY, the Purpose. It is the center of our cause and…
